socialSecurityDeathIndex

Class MainForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • socialSecurityDeathIndex.MainForm

  • public class MainForm
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple user interface form to enable loading and querying Social Security Death Index databases.
    This form contains the main() method for the SSDI application.
    Author:
    Jim Vlcek

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainForm() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MainForm getDefault()
      Get the default instance of the form
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Launch the application.
      void open()
      Open the window.
      void setCurrentRecord(IDeathRecord drCurrent)
      Set the current record under examination in the program
      The Social Security Account Number (SSAN) of the current record is displayed in a text box in the user interface.
      void setMasterFile(java.lang.String sPath)
      Set the path of the Social Security Death Index master file to be loaded.
      The value of this property is displayed in a text box in the user interface.

      • setCurrentRecord

        public void setCurrentRecord(IDeathRecord drCurrent)
        Set the current record under examination in the program
        The Social Security Account Number (SSAN) of the current record is displayed in a text box in the user interface.
        Parameters:
        drCurrent - the current socialSecurityDeathIndex to examine
